name: 蔡銘修
objective: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.
schedule:
01 02/22 Intro(research topic)
02 03/01 Endnote and Turnitin (bring your own laptop)
03 03/08 Research- Abstract
04 03/15 Research- Introduction 1
05 03/22 Research- Introduction 2
06 03/29 TVET Conference
07 04/05 No Class
08 04/12 Research- Literature Review & Introduction Practice
09 04/19 Midterm Week
10 04/26 Definition of terms
11 05/03 Research- Method
12 05/10 Research Result 
13 05/17 Research Discussion
14 05/24 Research Conclusion and Suggest
15 05/31 Writing for Final Paper Preparation
16 06/07 Final Presentation (15 mins per student)
17 06/14 Final Presentation (15 mins per student)
18 06/21 Final Exam Week (final paper due)
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1. Attendance 15%
2. Abstract 20%  
3. Final Presentation 25%
4. Final Research Paper 40% 
    - 12 font, 1.5 spaces
    - suggest full paper (7 pages)
5. Additional grade 5% (papers are accepted in International journal or conference)
materials:
Academic Writing for Graduate Students 3/e
Author: John M. Swales, & Christine B. Feak
Publisher: Michigan Press
Publication date: 2013/3
ISBN: 9780472034758
https://www.crane.com.tw/crane/index.php?action=product_detail&prod_no=P0116400141359
可至文鶴書局購買
remarks: 因應疫情防疫規定，可能調整教學方式為遠距教學，方式如下：期中及期末均採線上報告上課時間不變，上課方式採同步及非同步線上授課，同步使用 google meet，非同步使用北科 i 學園 plus 若對課程有問題請 email (mhtsai@ntut.edu.tw) 給授課教師，可另行約線上 meeting 時間。
